name: Power Lock
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You flood a target creature's vision with black, glimmering lights, who must make an Intuition saving throw or take 3d6 psychic and 3d6 radiant damage and have their AP costs increased by 1 for the duration. A successful saving throw deals half damage with no other effects.

If a creature affected by Fairylock is targeted, the creature additionally spends all remaining AP at the end of each of their turns.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, before spending AP as a result of this spell if applicable. On a success, the spell ends.
